verses.verse: Therefore <WG1352> thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> inexcusable <WG379>, O <WG5599> man <WG444>, whosoever <WG3956> thou art that judgest <WG2919> <WG5723>: for <WG1063> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> thou judgest <WG2919> <WG5719> another <WG2087>, thou condemnest <WG2632> <WG5719> thyself <WG4572>; for <WG1063> thou that judgest <WG2919> <WG5723> doest <WG4238> <WG5719> the same things <WG846>.

But <WG1161> we are sure <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> the judgment <WG2917> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> according <WG2596> to truth <WG225> against <WG1909> them which commit <WG4238> <WG5723> such things <WG5108>.

And <WG1161> thinkest thou <WG3049> <WG5736> this <WG5124>, O <WG5599> man <WG444>, that judgest <WG2919> <WG5723> them which do <WG4238> <WG5723> such things <WG5108>, and <WG2532> doest <WG4160> <WG5723> the same <WG846>, that <WG3754> thou <WG4771> shalt escape <WG1628> <WG5695> the judgment <WG2917> of 'Elohim <WG2316>?

Or <WG2228> despisest thou <WG2706> <WG5719> the riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> goodness <WG5544> and <WG2532> forbearance <WG463> and <WG2532> longsuffering <WG3115>; not knowing <WG50> <WG5723> that <WG3754> the goodness <WG5543> of 'Elohim <WG2316> leadeth <WG71> <WG5719> thee <WG4571> to <WG1519> repentance <WG3341>?

But <WG1161> after <WG2596> thy <WG4675> hardness <WG4643> and <WG2532> impenitent <WG279> heart <WG2588> treasurest up <WG2343> <WG5719> unto thyself <WG4572> wrath <WG3709> against <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of wrath <WG3709> and <WG2532> revelation <WG602> of the righteous judgment <WG1341> of 'Elohim <WG2316>;
Who <WG3739> will render <WG591> <WG5692> to every man <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his <WG846> deeds <WG2041>:

To them who by <WG3303> <WG2596> patient continuance <WG5281> in well <WG18> doing <WG2041> seek <WG2212> <WG5723> for glory <WG1391> and <WG2532> honour <WG5092> and <WG2532> immortality <WG861>, eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>:

But <WG1161> unto them that are contentious <WG1537> <WG2052>, and <WG2532> do not obey <WG544> <WG5723> <WG3303> the truth <WG225>, but <WG1161> obey <WG3982> <WG5734> unrighteousness <WG93>, indignation <WG2372> and <WG2532> wrath <WG3709>,

Tribulation <WG2347> and <WG2532> anguish <WG4730>, upon <WG1909> every <WG3956> soul <WG5590> of man <WG444> that doeth <WG2716> <WG5740> evil <WG2556>, of the Jew <WG2453> first <WG4412>, and <WG5037> also <WG2532> of the goy <WG1672>;

But <WG1161> <WG2532> glory <WG1391>, honour <WG5092>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, to every man <WG3956> that worketh <WG2038> <WG5740> good <WG18>, to the Jew <WG2453> first <WG4412>, and <WG5037> also <WG2532> to the goy <WG1672>:
For <WG1063> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> no <WG3756> respect of persons <WG4382> with <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> <WG5627> without Torah <WG460> shall <WG622> also <WG2532> perish <WG622> <WG5698> without Torah <WG460>: and <WG2532> as many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> <WG5627> in <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551> shall be judged <WG2919> <WG5701> by <WG1223> the Torah <WG3551>;

(For <WG1063> not <WG3756> the hearers <WG202> of the Torah <WG3551> are just <WG1342> before <WG3844> 'Elohim <WG2316>, but <WG235> the doers <WG4163> of the Torah <WG3551> shall be justified <WG1344> <WG5701>.

For <WG1063> when <WG3752> the goyim <WG1484>, which <WG3588> have <WG2192> <WG5723> not <WG3361> the Torah <WG3551>, do <WG4160> <WG5725> by nature <WG5449> the things <WG3588> contained in the Torah <WG3551>, these <WG3778>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> not <WG3361> the Torah <WG3551>, are <WG1526> <WG5748> a Torah <WG3551> unto themselves <WG1438>:

Which <WG3748> shew <WG1731> <WG5731> the work <WG2041> of the Torah <WG3551> written <WG1123> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588>, their <WG846> conscience <WG4893> also bearing witness <WG4828> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> their thoughts <WG3053> the mean while accusing <WG2723> <WG5723> or <WG2228> else <WG2532> excusing <WG626> <WG5740> one another <WG3342> <WG240>;)

In <WG1722> the day <WG2250> when <WG3753> 'Elohim <WG2316> shall judge <WG2919> <WG5692> <WG5719> the secrets <WG2927> of men <WG444> by <WG1223> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> according <WG2596> to my <WG3450> gospel <WG2098>.

Behold <WG2396>, thou <WG4771> art called <WG2028> <WG5743> a Jew <WG2453>, and <WG2532> restest <WG1879> <WG5736> in the Torah <WG3551>, and <WG2532> makest thy boast <WG2744> <WG5736> of <WG1722> 'Elohim <WG2316>,

And <WG2532> knowest <WG1097> <WG5719> his will <WG2307>, and <WG2532> approvest <WG1381> <WG5719> the things that are more excellent <WG1308> <WG5723>, being instructed <WG2727> <WG5746> out of <WG1537> the Torah <WG3551>;
And <WG5037> art confident <WG3982> <WG5754> that thou thyself <WG4572> art <WG1511> <WG5750> a guide <WG3595> of the blind <WG5185>, a light <WG5457> of them which are in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655>,

An instructor <WG3810> of the foolish <WG878>, a teacher <WG1320> of babes <WG3516>, which hast <WG2192> <WG5723> the form <WG3446> of knowledge <WG1108> and <WG2532> of the truth <WG225> in <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551>.

Thou therefore <WG3767> which <WG3588> teachest <WG1321> <WG5723> another <WG2087>, teachest thou <WG1321> <WG5719> not <WG3756> thyself <WG4572>? thou that preachest <WG2784> <WG5723> a man should <WG2813> not <WG3361> steal <WG2813> <WG5721>, dost thou steal <WG2813> <WG5719>?

Thou that sayest <WG3004> <WG5723> a man should <WG3431> not <WG3361> commit adultery <WG3431> <WG5721>, dost thou commit adultery <WG3431> <WG5719>? thou that abhorrest <WG948> <WG5740> idols <WG1497>, dost thou commit sacrilege <WG2416> <WG5719>?
Thou <WG3739> that makest thy boast <WG2744> <WG5736> of <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551>, through <WG1223> breaking <WG3847> the Torah <WG3551> dishonourest thou <WG818> <WG5719> 'Elohim <WG2316>?
For <WG1063> the name <WG3686> of 'Elohim <WG2316> is blasphemed <WG987> <WG5743> among <WG1722> the goyim <WG1484> through <WG1223> you <WG5209>, as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>.

For <WG1063> b'ritmilah <WG4061> verily <WG3303> profiteth <WG5623> <WG5719>, if <WG1437> thou keep <WG4238> <WG5725> the Torah <WG3551>: but <WG1161> if <WG1437> thou be <WG5600> <WG5753> a breaker <WG3848> of the Torah <WG3551>, thy <WG4675> b'ritmilah <WG4061> is made <WG1096> <WG5754> unb'ritmilah <WG203>.

Therefore <WG3767> if <WG1437> the unb'ritmilah <WG203> keep <WG5442> <WG5725> the righteousness <WG1345> of the Torah <WG3551>, shall <WG3049> not <WG3780> his <WG846> unb'ritmilah <WG203> be counted <WG3049> <WG5701> for <WG1519> b'ritmilah <WG4061>?

And <WG2532> shall not <WG2919> unb'ritmilah <WG203> which is by <WG1537> nature <WG5449>, if it fulfil <WG5055> <WG5723> the Torah <WG3551>, judge <WG2919> <WG5692> thee <WG4571>, who by <WG1223> the letter <WG1121> and <WG2532> b'ritmilah <WG4061> dost transgress <WG3848> the Torah <WG3551>?

For <WG1063> he is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> a Jew <WG2453>, which is one outwardly <WG1722> <WG5318>; neither <WG3761> is that b'ritmilah <WG4061>, which is outward <WG1722> <WG5318> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>:

But <WG235> he is a Jew <WG2453>, which is one inwardly <WG1722> <WG2927>; and <WG2532> b'ritmilah <WG4061> is that of the heart <WG2588>, in <WG1722> the spirit <WG4151>, and not <WG3756> in the letter <WG1121>; whose <WG3739> praise <WG1868> is not <WG3756> of <WG1537> men <WG444>, but <WG235> of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316>.
